title: Ticket #54: Missing params means preen doesn't clean unrelated directories
description: If VALID_SPOOL_FILES or INVALID_LOG_FILES isn't set in the config file, condor_preen refuses to do any cleaning. This is surprising to users. If VALID_SPOOL_FILES isn't set, preen could still clean the log and execute directories. If INVALID_LOG_FILES isn't set, preen could use an empty string as a default and clean all directories.
remarks:
2009-Jan-21 11:27:14 by jfrey:
We should also add the following files to preen's list of valid schedd files: .quillwritepassword .pgpass

2009-Jan-26 15:57:27 by jfrey:
Fix pushed to master (V7_3).
